articles.content:
Aardman has today announced its plans for the 30th anniversary celebrations of Wallace & Gromit: The Wrong Trousers.
Released in 1993, The Wrong Trousers was the first film starring the beloved … [+5630 chars]

articles.title: Bluedot festival: Cultural icon Grace Jones to headline - BBC
articles.description: Grace Jones will be joined by Pavement and Roisin Murphy at the top of Bluedot's bill, organisers say.
articles.content:
"Cultural icon" Grace Jones has been announced as the headliner of the next Bluedot festival.
The singer, actress and model, who curated London's Meltdown in 2022, will play under the gaze of the Lo… [+2569 chars]
